data.prayer: Over 42.41 percent of the people of Krasnodar are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Krasnodar, Russia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Krasnodar, Russia to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.section_summary: On average, 93 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Krasnodar, Russia.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, encourage the church of Krasnodar, Russia that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 774,000 citizens of Krasnodar, Russia, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Turk people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Turk people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Turk people is yours.
Lord, use Google search to lead people in Krasnodar, Russia to the gospel today.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Krasnodar, Russia a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Krasnodar.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

location.name: Krasnodar
location.people_groups_list: Shapsug, Circassian, Adyghe, Kurd, Kurmanji, Hemshin
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Shapsug, Circassian (4,000), Adyghe (142,000), Kurd, Kurmanji (24,000), Hemshin (2,100)
